summary: App to track seed starting dates, germination dates, soil type, and daily light received for planted seeds.

existing_features.title: Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) appropriate for gardening/seed-starting, and apply it consistently across all screens using Tailwind + existing UI components (do not use a blue/purple default theme).

Build the main UI to manage seed/planting entries: (1) a list view showing key fields (name, start date, germination status/date, soil type, daily light), (2) an add entry form, and (3) an edit entry workflow.
Implement client-side data fetching and mutations using React Query for all seed/planting CRUD operations, including loading and error states for list and form actions.

Add basic UX helpers: validation and user-friendly input controls for dates and numeric daily light (e.g., require non-empty name, valid start date, daily light must be a non-negative number). All user-facing strings must be in English.
Add a simple detail view (or expandable row) for an entry that displays all recorded information (including optional germination date) and provides edit/delete actions.
Generate and include a small set of cohesive static visual assets to support the app theme (e.g., logo/mark and subtle background/illustrations) and render them from frontend static assets.
Add a UI control in the plant entry list screen that lets the user filter the displayed seed/planting entries by soil type.

new_feature_requests.summary: Track seed starting date for each seed/planting
Track germination date/status for each seed/planting
Record soil type used for each seed/planting
Record daily light received for each seed/planting

Implement backend data model and persistence for seed/planting entries with fields: plant/seed name, seed starting date, germination date (optional), soil type, and daily light received (numeric, e.g., hours/day). Provide stable storage so entries persist across canister upgrades.

Provide backend CRUD APIs for seed/planting entries: create, list (all), get by id, update, and delete. Include derived/returned germination status (e.g., germinated = germinationDate is set) in responses or make it straightforward for the frontend to compute.
Add a way to filter seed/planting entries by soil type in the UI (e.g., dropdown/select or chips)
